info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Saratoga County through 315 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Day Center, or 18 miles southwest of Lake George Village, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Day Center, Mount Pleasant, West Day, Fox Hill and Lake View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
